Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1444 Dangerous Buildings

1444.01Responsibility of owners. 1444.02Right of entry of Building and Zoning Inspector. 1444.03Notices to repair; conformity with Building and Housing and Zoning Codes required. 1444.04Appeals. 1444.05Recovery of demolition and removal costs. 1444.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Removal of unsafe structures - see Ohio R.C. 715.26(B), 715.261

Abandoned service stations - see Ohio R.C. 3791.11 et seq.

Removal of improvements from real property - see GEN. OFF. 642.08

Nonconforming buildings - see P. & Z. 1278.07et seq.
